mean_en: to make something less physically strong; to become less physically strong; to make somebody/something less strong or powerful; to become less strong or powerful
sentence: His eating disorder and insufficient food intake obviously weakened him.
sentence_trans: 饮食失调和摄入不足明显使他变得虚弱了。
word_etyma: weak虚弱的 + en表动词 → weaken削弱，变弱
